LanguageData.LTSCourierDeniedMessage: You have been denied a courier due to previous unfortunate incidents.
LanguageData.LTSCourierArrivalMessage: A courier named {PAWN_nameDef} has arrived. {PAWN_pronoun} will deliver rent and perhaps other things too! Do try to keep {PAWN_objective} alive.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDelivered: {PAWN_nameDef} has concluded {PAWN_possessive} delivery and will soon leave.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredRent: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a grand total of {0} silver from tenants.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredRentGold: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a grand total of {0} silver and {1} gold from tenants.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredGift: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a gift from a previous happy tenant! How nice!
LanguageData.LTSCourierDeliveredTech: The Courier Association is pleased with your work and decided to gift you a hint of their technology.
LanguageData.LTSCourierTenancyNotice: {PAWN_nameDef} noticed your note for tenancy and posted a possible applicant.
LanguageData.LTSCourierTenancyNoticeFailFunds: {PAWN_nameDef} noticed some issue with your advertisement and leaves it as is urging you to correct this issue.
LanguageData.LTSLoneCourierDied: A courier {PAWN_nameDef} died while in the area. You are blamed for this incident.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementPlaced: Advertisement is put up, now to wait for a courier to pick it up.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementFailed: {PAWN_nameDef} somehow failed {PAWN_possessive} task of placing an advertisement. not enough silver.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementGizmoDesc: If toggled on, a pawn will make sure you have an advert up at all times as long as you can afford it.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementSingleRoomGizmoDesc: A pawn will require a single room but pays extra for it. Failure to provide a single room will cause frustration for the tenant.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementFightableGizmoDesc: Whether they can fight(✓) or not(X). Does not take account for pawn traits or other means of disabling violence.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementMayJoinGizmoDesc: Whether they can ask to join your faction(✓) or not(X).
LanguageData.LTSAdvertisementCostDesc: How much silver it costs to put up an advert for tenancy which forces the event upon courier retrieval.
LanguageData.LTSExpectedRent: New applicants daily rent of: {0} silver
LanguageData.LTSContractText: {PAWN_nameDef} would love to prolong {PAWN_possessive} stay. Would you accept the same contract of {0} silver per day for {1} days?
LanguageData.LTSContractJoinReject: {PAWN_nameDef} is saddened but does not pry further.
LanguageData.LTSContractJoinAccept: {PAWN_nameDef} is very happy and vows that {PAWN_pronoun} will not make you regret your decision.
LanguageData.LTSMoodBelowThresholdDesc: Your tenant {PAWN_nameDef} is unhappy. Try to make {PAWN_objective} feel better or {PAWN_pronoun}'ll leave.
LanguageData.LTSTenancyRoomRequiredDesc: A tenant pays for a single room but does not have one! You might earn their ire should this not be fixed soon.
LanguageData.LTSLoneTenantDied: The tenant {PAWN_nameDef} died while leaving the area. You are blamed for this incident.
LanguageData.LTSCourierDaysSpawnDesc: The minimum time between courier events. Note: You still require a noticeboard.
LanguageData.LTSTenancyRentContractDesc: How much silver is paid per contract day.
LanguageData.LTSMoodTicksDesc: Amount of required ticks to trigger a mood related event for tenants.
LanguageData.LTSKillPenaltyDesc: Whether killing tenants and couriers have other consequenses.
LanguageData.LTSGoldPaymentDesc: Couriers deliver mix of silver and gold upon delivery if accumulated rent is over 500 silver. A random amount up to 20% can be converted to gold. Conversion rate: 1 gold = 10 silver.
LanguageData.LTSAdvertNoticeSoundDesc: Whether a beep and a message should be played whenever a pawn set ups a notice or any other tenancy related events.
